text:
Hi 

I had just installed the Tomcat 5.5.17 on linux red hat9. I had also installed
the admin pack in the same dirctory as of tomcat. Now I am unable to login in
Tomcat Administration. 

Best Regards
Nikunj
creator: nikunj.aggarwal@induslogic.com
nikunj.aggarwal@induslogic.com
text:
Hi,

by default Tomcat does'nt allow admin and manager to login. Go to 
conf/tomcat-users.xml and add the roles for admin and manager.

Regards
Nikunj Aggarwal

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text: *** Bug 39601 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
